extends Object
implements TncsContentHandler
    Default TNCC content handler.

      List<TnccsMessage> collectMessages()
      Requests the handler to ask its handlers for messages they want to sent in a batch.

      Forwards a list of of minor validation exceptions but does not allow the handler to send error messages in return.

      Forwards a list of messages from a batch but does not allow the handler to send messages in return.

      Handles a list of minor validation exceptions and returns a list of error messages for a new batch if necessary.

      Handles a list of message from a batch and returns a list of messages for a new batch if necessary.
      void setConnectionState(de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.connection.TncConnectionState connectionState)
      Notifies the handler that the state of the related connection has changed.
      List<TnccsMessage> solicitRecommendation()
      Requests messages containing a recommendation based on evaluations from the available IMV, from the contained handlers.
